Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Santana Resort places you in the heart of Surfers Paradise, convenient to Gold Coast Convention and Exhibition Centre and Jupiters Casino. This family-friendly apartment is within close proximity of Broadbeach Mall and Oasis Shopping Centre.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 39 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Rooms have private balconies. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include microwaves and coffee/tea makers, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (surcharge).

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and bicycles to rent. Additional features at this Art Deco apartment include wireless Internet access (surcharge), an arcade/game room, and tour/ticket assistance.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, express check-in, and express check-out. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-out time is 10 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old.
